description: With its tasty flavour combo of peanut and coconut, this chicken satay recipe is perfect for an easy midweek dinner.
name: Easy Chicken Satay Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice among plates. Top with snow peas and chicken. Sprinkle with peanuts and coriander. Serve with lime wedges and satay sauce.
